data.text: @Rachel_Hoopsick @CDCgov I feel so nauseated with this announcement

@Arizona_RN @Rachel_Hoopsick @CDCgov The American people declared the pandemic over long ago.

And it’s not a good sign in terms of our ability to successfully deal with serious challenges in the future.

@Rachel_Hoopsick @CDCgov This whole thing just confirms that the US is anti-family. 
https://t.co/67xHNA5SyN
